verses.name: Leviticus 25:33
verses.text: And if a man purchase of the Levites, then the house that was sold, and the city of his possession, shall go out in the year of jubile: for the houses of the cities of the Levites are their possession among the children of Israel.

verses.name: Leviticus 25:34
verses.text: But the field of the suburbs of their cities may not be sold; for it is their perpetual possession.

verses.name: Leviticus 25:35
verses.text: And if thy brother be waxen poor, and fallen in decay with thee; then thou shalt relieve him: yea, though he be a stranger, or a sojourner; that he may live with thee.
